1.title: Holly and Lloyd

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Holly's love for baggy cardigans really upsets her boyfriend Lloyd, who wants her to wear her inner beauty on the outside. Can a restyle help Holly feel gorgeous?

2.title: Will & Anna

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Will is smart and organized, which contrasts with his cartwheeling carefree girlfriend Anna. The only thing he would change is her dress sense- now he has his chance.

3.title: Jo & Allen

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Allen has a tradition al look, but Jo's a big kid with the wardrobe of a skateboarder. Can a restyle by Allen bring back the spark their 10 year marriage has lost?

4.title: Ciaran & Anita

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Anita is a colourful character with clothes to match, unlike rocker Ciaran who prefers dark shades. Can Ciaran step up and restyle Anita before their wedding?

5.title: Juel & Jerome

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Jerome can't cope with his wife Juel's loud wardrobe, and wants her to emulate him and keep it cool. Can he convince her, or will Juel's protests drown him out?

6.title: Jo & Paul

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Jo loves leather and daring short skirts, while Paul wants her to tone it down. Will a restyle bring the elegance he's looking for, or will Jo's confidence pay the price?

7.title: Sid & Shabs

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Shabs has a collection of shapeless jumpers that endlessly frustrate husband Sid. He wants to glam up her gear to give Shabs confidence, but he may achieve the opposite.

8.title: The Revenge

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Lisa Snowdon has helped seven husbands and partners to transform their other halves? wardrobes from disastrous to dazzling. Now, the girls are back ? for revenge.

1.title: Jamie & Alicia

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Emigrating away from her family and friends has taken its toll on Alicia's self-esteem and sense of style. Can her husband Jaime help to rebuild her confidence with a new wardrobe?

2.title: Tom & Lou

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Now living and working in the countryside, the once vibrant Lou has left her passion for fashion back in the city. Can her fianc��� Tom help her out of her style rut?

3.title: Mark & Lynsey

episode of.title: Your Style in His Hands (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Lynsey has lost a lot of weight but still hides under baggy clothes. With her confidence at rock bottom, can husband Mark rebuild his wife's wardrobe and her self-esteem?

imdb.title: Your Style in His Hands
akas: Your Style in His Hands (United Kingdom)
plot: Lisa Snowdon is back on TLC with the second series of _Your Style in His Hands_ (qv), and this time we've reworked the format to add more drama, more jeopardy and more clueless chaps thinking they can shop!
